statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{14}={3}{x}+{5}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{14}={3}{x}+{5}. We undo the \displaystyle+{5} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{9}={3}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{3} by dividing by \displaystyle{3} on both sides.
